DealIndirectPartner.name: DealIndirectPartner
DealIndirectPartner.description: Represents an indirect partnerâ€™s involvement in a deal.

AccountId.description: The account associated with the indirect partner on the deal.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the record was last referenced by the user or system.

LastViewedDate.description: Date and the timestamp when the record was last viewed in the Salesforce UI. Helps monitor user access and engagement.

LeadId.description: Reference to a lead associated with this indirect partner record.

Name.description: System-generated unique identifier for the record, used for lookup and reference purposes.

OpportunityId.description: Opportunity associated with the indirect partner.

OwnerId.description: User or group that owns this record.

PartnerName.description: Name of the indirect partner participating in the deal. This field captures the business or entity name.

PartnerRoleType.description: The role played by the indirect partner in the deal. Common values might include Reseller, Distributor, and so on.

PrimaryContactFirstName.description: First name of the primary contact at the partner organization.

PrimaryContactLastName.description: Last name of the primary contact at the partner organization.

PrimaryContactName.description: Full name of the primary contact. This field may be auto-generated by combining first and last names or used for reporting purposes.
